aboutSubtitle.ja: インターネットを旅する仲間のみなさん、ようこそ

aboutContent.en:
I am building this site to showcase some creations, and to find friends and co-collaborators. I have far (farrr) too many ideas and not enough time, and it'd be nice to hack on some ideas together. My goal is to build with people who I'd want to spend time with anyway.

I'm good on the product side. I'm great at public speaking, fundraising and communicating. I'm pretty bad at coding, but I'm good at talking to an AI until I get what I want.

If any of my ideas are interesting to you and you'd like to collaborate, find a way to contact me and let's see if we click.
aboutContent.ja:
このサイトは、つくったものを披露しつつ新しい友人や共創者を探すために育てています。アイデアは（本当に）山ほどあるのに時間が全然足りません。いくつかを一緒にハックしてくれる仲間がいたら嬉しいです。目標は、一緒に過ごしたくなる人たちとモノをつくること。

プロダクトづくりには自信があります。プレゼンやファンドレイズ、コミュニケーションも得意です。コードを書くのはあまり上手じゃないけれど、欲しい結果が出るまでAIと話し続けるのは得意です。

どれかのアイデアが少しでも響いたら、何らかの方法で連絡してください。相性が合うか、一度一緒に確かめてみましょう。

text.en: Cinematic UI systems, immersive spatial audio, sensor-driven choreography, and collaborative design research.
text.ja: シネマティックなUIシステム、没入型の空間オーディオ、センサー駆動の振付、共同デザインリサーチに取り組んでいます。

text.en: I have literally hundreds of ideas waiting to be burned through. Most of them are terrible. Some, I assume, are good ideas.
text.ja: 燃やす順番待ちのアイデアが文字通り何百もあります。たいていはひどいけれど、いくつかはきっといいアイデアです。

text.en: Building responsive worlds where light, audio, and interface gestures share the same pulse through WebGL and realtime systems.
text.ja: WebGLとリアルタイムシステムで、光・音・インターフェースのジェスチャーが同じ鼓動で動く世界を仕立てています。

about.lead: Creative technologist guiding teams through ambient operating systems, tactile exhibition tooling, and cinematic web soundscapes. This dossier carries the studio ethos, collaborators, and signals shaping each commission. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
about.headline: Sculpting Interfaces That Listen Back
about.summary: I am a technologist who loves making things. Generally software, but I also love exploring art, words, music and comedy.
about.practiceVectors: Cinematic UI systems, immersive spatial audio, sensor-driven choreography, and collaborative design research. Each commission blends physical staging with realtime web tooling for performers and exhibition teams.
currentCollaborators: Signal Grid Lab — adaptive lighting for touring stages.
Archive Atlas — sonic archives with tactile playback consoles.
Field Lexicon Collective — language prototypes for future venues.
about.operatingPrinciples: Lead with listening, prototype in the open, and let every surface emit warmth. Projects hinge on calibrating atmosphere as carefully as code so collaborators feel invited into the signal.

history.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Jay Winder launched a resonant lab for touring installations, experimenting with ambient operating systems that listen as performers move.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Crafted WebGL observatories for civic archives, translating sensor data into luminous sonic gradients for public play.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Embedded with research theaters to build responsive stage controls that blend composer gestures with adaptive lighting.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Began as a systems artist translating modular synthesis workflows into interactive exhibition tooling and haptic audio consoles.

signals.description: Lorem ipsum interfaces, ambient OS prototypes, spatial sound choreography.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet technologist dictum—craft the atmosphere, prototype with hospitality, and release tools that invite co-authorship.
Lorem ipsum residencies, collaborative field recordings, and sensor-driven storytelling research.

lead.en: An inconclusive list of some things I've built.
lead.ja: 作ってきたもののうち、ほんの一部を気ままに並べています。

lead.en: Essays, blog posts, and some comedy(coming soon).
lead.ja: エッセイ、ブログ、それからもうすぐ公開するコメディを並べています。
拾い集めた周波数のいくつかを置いています。

lead.en: Generative sequences that document how the homepage dot field bends, glitches, and blooms across its interactive modes.
lead.ja: ホームのドットフィールドが各モードでどう歪み、グリッチし、花開くのかを記録したジェネレーティブなシーケンス集です。
